original_text: And in all matters of wisdom and understanding, that the king enquired of them, he found them ten times better than all the magicians and astrologers that were in all his realm.
korean_text: 왕이 그들에게 모든 일을 묻는 중에 그 지혜와 총명이 온 나라 박수와 술객보다 십 배나 나은 줄을 아니라

sentences.original_text: And in all matters of wisdom and understanding
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 지혜와 이해의 문제에 있어서

sentences.original_text: that the king enquired of them
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그들에게 물었던 모든 것에 있어서

sentences.original_text: he found them ten times better
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 열 배 더 낫다는 것을 발견했다

sentences.original_text: than all the magicians and astrologers
that were in all his realm
